name: SCP TCF Event
description:
Proof of concept for a 2D topdown scp game.

Short game (< 10mn).

Feature :

  • 049 and 173.
  • 2 endings
  • blinking mechanic

I like scp:cb, but I feel like there is a lack of story in it. I would like to make a full game on a similar concept, but making an actual game is long and difficult, that's why I'm making this proof of concept to see if people are interested.

Please leave feedback if you want more!
